articles.title: Charlie Munger was still a master of the one-liner in his 90s, calling crypto 'venereal disease' and AI overhyped
articles.description: The "Oracle of Pasadena" leaves behind decades' worth of zingers, including savage takedowns of bitcoin and other cryptocurrencies.
articles.content:
Legendary investor Charlie Munger died Tuesday aged 99.Nati Harnik/AP
